Package org.apache.pivot.wtk

Interface ListViewListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ListViewListener.Adapter, ListViewListener.Listeners, TerraListViewSkin
    public interface ListViewListener
    List view listener interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  ListViewListener.Adapter
      Deprecated.
      Since 2.1 and Java 8 the interface itself has default implementations.
      static class  ListViewListener.Listeners
      List view listeners.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void checkmarksEnabledChanged​(ListView listView)
      Called when a list view's checkmarks enabled flag has changed.
      default void checkmarksMixedAsCheckedChanged​(ListView listView)
      Called when a list view's flag to decide if mixed checkbox state should be treated as checked has been changed.
      default void checkmarksTriStateChanged​(ListView listView)
      Called when a list view's tri-state checkmarks flag has been changed.
      default void disabledCheckmarkFilterChanged​(ListView listView, Filter<?> previousDisabledCheckmarkFilter)
      Called when a list view's disabled checkmark filter has changed.
      default void disabledItemFilterChanged​(ListView listView, Filter<?> previousDisabledItemFilter)
      Called when a list view's disabled item filter has changed.
      default void itemEditorChanged​(ListView listView, ListView.ItemEditor previousItemEditor)
      Called when a list view's item editor has changed.
      default void itemRendererChanged​(ListView listView, ListView.ItemRenderer previousItemRenderer)
      Called when a list view's item renderer has changed.
      default void listDataChanged​(ListView listView, List<?> previousListData)
      Called when a list view's list data has changed.
      default void selectModeChanged​(ListView listView, ListView.SelectMode previousSelectMode)
      Called when a list view's select mode has changed.

    • Method Detail

      • listDataChanged

        default void listDataChanged​(ListView listView,
                             List<?> previousListData)
        Called when a list view's list data has changed.
        Parameters:
        listView - The source of the event.
        previousListData - The previous list data that was displayed.

      • itemRendererChanged

        default void itemRendererChanged​(ListView listView,
                                 ListView.ItemRenderer previousItemRenderer)
        Called when a list view's item renderer has changed.
        Parameters:
        listView - The source of the event.
        previousItemRenderer - The previous renderer used for each item.

      • itemEditorChanged

        default void itemEditorChanged​(ListView listView,
                               ListView.ItemEditor previousItemEditor)
        Called when a list view's item editor has changed.
        Parameters:
        listView - The source of the event.
        previousItemEditor - The previous editor used for updating items.

      • selectModeChanged

        default void selectModeChanged​(ListView listView,
                               ListView.SelectMode previousSelectMode)
        Called when a list view's select mode has changed.
        Parameters:
        listView - The source of the event.
        previousSelectMode - The previous selection mode.

      • checkmarksEnabledChanged

        default void checkmarksEnabledChanged​(ListView listView)
        Called when a list view's checkmarks enabled flag has changed.
        Parameters:
        listView - The list view that has been changed.

      • checkmarksTriStateChanged

        default void checkmarksTriStateChanged​(ListView listView)
        Called when a list view's tri-state checkmarks flag has been changed.
        Parameters:
        listView - The list view that has been changed.

      • checkmarksMixedAsCheckedChanged

        default void checkmarksMixedAsCheckedChanged​(ListView listView)
        Called when a list view's flag to decide if mixed checkbox state should be treated as checked has been changed.
        Parameters:
        listView - The list view that has been changed.

      • disabledItemFilterChanged

        default void disabledItemFilterChanged​(ListView listView,
                                       Filter<?> previousDisabledItemFilter)
        Called when a list view's disabled item filter has changed.
        Parameters:
        listView - The source of the event.
        previousDisabledItemFilter - The previous filter function used to disable specific items.

      • disabledCheckmarkFilterChanged

        default void disabledCheckmarkFilterChanged​(ListView listView,
                                            Filter<?> previousDisabledCheckmarkFilter)
        Called when a list view's disabled checkmark filter has changed.
        Parameters:
        listView - The source of the event.
        previousDisabledCheckmarkFilter - The previous filter function used to disable checkmarks for certain items.
